item.description:
Friends..... This is a nice Italian festival to get out to. I will mostly likely go on Friday July 29th or Sunday, July 31st. We can make this the date or whenever your schedule permits.  

RSVP yes and the day that you are going. Maybe we can all meetup for a pizza fritte (fried dough)

Ci vediamo e buon divertimento questa fina settimana!

Lorenzo

 

7th annual Italian Festival begins

Date: 07/29/2011 

The annual Italian-American Festival kicks off Friday night at 5 p.m. on July 29 and runs thru Sunday night.  The location remains on lower Center Street.  There is free admission for food vendors, childrens carnival, entertainment.  The event is sponsored by UNICO and the Southington Sons of Italy.  For more information call the Chamber @ 8600-628-8036.

 

 

 

http://southingtoncoc.com/disport.php?ID=528
item.name: Italian American Festival - Southington,CT July 29-31
